Privacy Policy

1. Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, update your profile, or list an item. This may include your name, email address, and phone number.

2. How We Use Information

We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to process transactions, and to communicate with you about listings and updates.

3. Data Security

We take reasonable security measures to protect your information, including encryption of sensitive data like passwords.

4. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access and review your account information
  • Update or correct your details
  • Request deletion of your account
